void liblog_finish (  ) 

Terminates the logging system. This function also frees the resources being used by the logging system.

void liblog_init ( const char *  identifier  ) 

Initializes the logging system. If the logging is already active, subsequent calls to this function won't allocate any new resources.

Parameters:
[in] identifier - the log identifier
